academic_and_research.details: A rich collection of over 29,000+ print books, 1,00,000+ e-books, and 45,000+ online journals/e-resources (accessible via My Athens Remote Access Service). Provides various services including Information Literacy programs.

Numerous state-of-the-art labs for hands-on experience and research, including: 
- **Computer Labs:** Multiple general and departmental labs (e.g., Software Engineering Lab, Digital Systems Lab) with high-configuration computers and industry-standard software (e.g., MATLAB, SPSS, AutoCAD, Oracle).
- **Engineering Labs:** Electrical Circuits, Electronics, Digital Systems, Telecommunication, Computer Communications & Networking, High Voltage/Machine, Power System, VLSI Lab, and extensive Civil Engineering Labs (e.g., Surveying, Geotechnical, Environmental, Strength of Materials).
- **Science Labs:** Pharmacy Labs (equipped with HPLC, GC, FTIR), Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology Labs, and Physics Laboratory.
- **Language Laboratory:** Dedicated facility to facilitate English language learning.
Dedicated center to advance academic research and community engagement. Includes a Research Hub with state-of-the-art computers and various research software (e.g., Turnitin, Endnote, SPSS, STATA).
Clean, spacious, and fully air-conditioned classrooms equipped with modern multimedia projectors and overhead projectors.

information_technology.details: High-speed internet (512 Mbps dedicated full-duplex) with free open **wireless network** available throughout almost all parts of the campus (both indoors and outdoors).
Provides a secure, reliable ICT infrastructure for core IT services, network stability, IP telephony, and server virtualization.
Maintenance of the official website, online grade reporting, online admission system, and a dedicated email system for students, faculty, and staff.

student_life_and_welfare.details: Oversees student activities and manages **18 student clubs** and organizations, organizing cultural events, sports tournaments (Cricket, Football, Indoor Games), seminars, and workshops.
Aids students in development, liaises with employers, and arranges **internships and job placements** through job fairs and workshops.
Provides **free medical services** (full-time facility) to students and staff.
Facilities include an **indoor sports area** for various games.

other_support_services: Office of The IQAC (Institutional Quality Assurance Cell)
